title: TechFest 2025
description: A grand celebration of technology and innovation, featuring coding marathons, project exhibitions, and workshops.

title: Cultural Week Kick-off
description: Join us for the start of the annual cultural week with music, dance, and drama performances.

title: Robotics Championship 2024
description: A showcase of the finest robots built by our students.

title: Annual Sports Meet 2025
description: Witness thrilling athletic competitions and cheer for your favorite teams. A day of sportsmanship and fun.

title: AI & Machine Learning Seminar
description: A deep dive into the future of Artificial Intelligence with industry expert Dr. Arshad Khan.

title: Career Fair 2025
description: Connect with top companies from the tech and business sectors. Bring your resumes and dress to impress!

title: Music Night: Unplugged
description: An evening of soulful acoustic performances by our talented students and local artists.

title: Web Development Workshop
description: A hands-on workshop on modern front-end frameworks like React and Vue.js. Laptops required.

title: Alumni Connect 2025
description: A wonderful opportunity to network with our esteemed alumni and gain insights into the corporate world.

title: Blood Donation Drive
description: Give the gift of life. A single donation can save up to three lives. Your participation is invaluable.

title: Drama Festival: StageCraft
description: A showcase of theatrical talent with a series of short plays and skits performed by the Drama Club.

title: Convocation Ceremony 2024
description: Celebrating the academic achievements of our graduating batch of 2024.

title: Inter-Department Cricket Tournament
description: The most awaited cricket tournament of the year. Witness fierce competition and exciting matches.

title: Art & Photography Exhibition
description: An exhibition displaying the creative works of our talented artists and photographers.

title: Guest Lecture on Blockchain
description: Understanding the fundamentals and future of Blockchain technology with an industry leader.

title: Independence Day Celebration
description: A day of patriotic fervor with flag hoisting, cultural programs, and speeches.

title: CodeStorm Hackathon 2024
description: A 24-hour non-stop coding challenge where teams build innovative solutions to real-world problems.

title: Python for Data Science Workshop
description: An introductory workshop covering the basics of Python programming for data analysis using Pandas and NumPy.

title: Tree Plantation Drive 2024
description: A green initiative to make our campus more beautiful and environmentally friendly. Join us in planting saplings.

title: Science Fair & Project Expo
description: A display of innovative science projects and models created by students from all departments.

title: Marathon for Charity
description: Run for a cause! A 5K marathon to raise funds for local charities. Open for students, faculty, and the public.

title: Basant Kite Festival
description: Celebrating the arrival of spring with a colorful kite flying festival. Music, food, and fun for everyone.

title: Orientation Day 2024
description: Welcoming the new batch of students to our campus. An introduction to college life, faculty, and facilities.
